sentences.en: An application of cellular neural network ( CNN ) in mathematical morphology is presented.
sentences.cn: 给出了细胞神经网络 ( CNN ) 在数学形态学中的应用.

sentences.en: An edge detection Algorithm based on lifting wavelet and morphology was proposed.
sentences.cn: 摘要提出了一种基于小波提升和形态学的图像边缘检测方法.

sentences.en: Double staining showed two populations of cells with different morphology and color.
sentences.cn: 双重染色显示两种形态和颜色不同的细胞.

sentences.en: In fact, a major theme in research here is how the morphology of the bird influences its behavior.
sentences.cn: 实际上，探寻鸟类形态如何影响它的行为是该实验室的主要研究课题。

sentences.en: In fact, a major theme in research here is how the morphology of the bird influences its behavior.
sentences.cn: 事实上，该实验室研究的一个主要方向是鸟儿的形态是如何影响它们的动作的。

sentences.en: Molar's status, morphology of crown and root in orthodontic patients.
sentences.cn: 正畸患者中后牙健康状况及磨牙冠根形态调查.

sentences.en: Morpheme is the basic unit in the study of morphology.
sentences.cn: 词素是形态学研究的最基本的单位。

sentences.en: No longer can biologists be content simply to study morphology.
sentences.cn: 生物学家不再满足于简单地研究形态学.

sentences.en: The morphology of abnormal graphites has the three - dimensional interconnection net like structure.
sentences.cn: 异常石墨的形态表现出相互联结的立体网络状.

sentences.en: The morphology of glass surface is observed by polarizing microscope.
sentences.cn: 利用偏光显微镜,拍摄显微照片,观察表面形貌.

sentences.en: The morphology of the diamond nanoplatelets varies with growth conditions.
sentences.cn: 奈米平板钻石会因为制程条件的改变,而呈现不同的形貌.

sentences.en: The morphology of the region also indicates that it has been uplifted recently.
sentences.cn: 这个地区的地形也表明,它最近一直上升.

sentences.en: The morphology of the region indicates that it has been uplifted recently.
sentences.cn: 这个地区的地形表明,它最近一直在上升.

sentences.en: The morphology study showed that the rutile crystals prepared were simplex.
sentences.cn: 形貌分析表明,制备的金红石晶粒常见形态为单形.

sentences.en: The Open - Close operation is a fundamental operation in mathematical morphology.
sentences.cn: 形态学开、闭运算以腐蚀和膨胀为基础.

sentences.en: The rash morphology progresses from papules to pustules and finally to crusting lesions.
sentences.cn: 皮疹的形态从最初的丘疹发展至脓疱，最终局部脱屑。

sentences.en: The rings and networks have some classificatory characteristics in morphology.
sentences.cn: 菌环、菌网及孢子具有一定的形态学特征。

sentences.en: They attain complex morphology, appearing as branched, tubular processes.
sentences.cn: 它们达到复杂的形态, 出现分枝, 管状突起.

sentences.en: This illustration shows the typical morphology of a carcinoid tumor.
sentences.cn: 下图为典型的肾类癌表现.

words.tran_cn: 在屏幕上变换图像；改变
[晶体][生物]形态学，形态论；[语]词法，词态学

phrases.tran_cn: [晶]晶体形态学；形态结晶学；晶体结构

trans.tran_cn: 形态学（尤指动植物形态学或词语形态学）
trans.tran_en: the study of the  morpheme s  of a language and of the way in which they are joined together to make words
